installer_page_description: Bulk install popular applications using Winget

debloater_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to remove {{count}} application(s)? This action cannot be easily undone.

system_tweaks_page_description: Configure Windows system settings and optimizations
restart_required_message: A system restart is required for this change to take full effect.
windows_defender_manage_message: Please use Windows Security settings to manage Windows Defender
clear_temp_files_description: Remove temporary files to free up disk space and improve performance.
flush_dns_cache_description: Clear DNS cache to resolve network connectivity issues.
windows_defender_description: Real-time protection status against malware and threats.
performance_mode_description: Optimize system settings for maximum performance.
telemetry_reenable_message: To re-enable telemetry, use Windows Settings
web_privacy_enabled: Enhanced tracking protection enabled for supported browsers
web_privacy_disabled: Enhanced tracking protection disabled for supported browsers
privacy_page_description: Control your privacy and data collection settings
disable_windows_recall_description: Disable AI-based data analysis and Recall feature (Windows 24H2+)
recall_detailed_description: Windows Recall is an AI-powered screenshot and activity tracking system coming in Windows 24H2 and later. It records all your actions and analyzes them with AI.
recall_feature_registry: Disables AI data analysis via Registry
recall_feature_dism: Completely removes Recall feature with DISM command
disable_telemetry_advanced_description: Comprehensive telemetry disabling - includes scheduled tasks and Edge restrictions
telemetry_advanced_detailed_description: Blocks all telemetry data collected by Microsoft via Windows and Edge. Covers 40+ registry settings and scheduled tasks.
telemetry_advanced_feature_suggestions: Disables app suggestions and consumer features
telemetry_advanced_warn_managed_by_org: You might see "Managed by your organization" message
telemetry_advanced_warn_store_features: Some Windows Store features might not work
disable_telemetry_basic_description: Basic telemetry setting - stops Windows diagnostic data
telemetry_basic_detailed_description: Stops basic diagnostic and usage data Windows sends to Microsoft. A simple and quick solution.
disable_location_advanced_description: Completely disable location tracking - all registry and services
location_advanced_detailed_description: Completely prevents Windows from collecting and using your location data. Includes 6 different registry settings and service management.
location_advanced_feature_policy_scripts: Blocks location scripts at policy level
location_advanced_warn_apps_not_work: Some applications might not work correctly
location_services_basic_description: Basic location service control - app-based permission management
location_services_basic_detailed_descrip: Controls applications' access to your device location. Simple enable/disable mechanism.
microphone_access_description: Manage applications' access to the microphone
microphone_access_detailed_description: Controls whether Windows applications can access your microphone.
microphone_access_feature_manage_all_app: Manages microphone permission for all applications
camera_access_description: Control applications' access to the camera
camera_access_detailed_description: Controls whether Windows applications can access your webcam.
web_privacy_description: Browser tracking protection - for supported browsers
web_privacy_detailed_description: Enables enhanced tracking protection and privacy settings in web browsers.
web_privacy_warn_some_sites_may_not_work: Some sites might not work correctly
activity_history_description: Clear and disable Windows activity history
activity_history_detailed_description: Clears Windows Timeline and activity tracking. Deletes recently used documents, clipboard history, and timeline data.
remove_onedrive_description: Completely remove OneDrive and move files - Permanent operation!
onedrive_detailed_description: Completely removes Microsoft OneDrive from the system and moves all your files to default Windows folders.
onedrive_feature_move_files: Moves Desktop, Documents, Pictures etc. files
onedrive_req_disk_space: Sufficient disk space must be available
onedrive_warn_files_moved: Files in OneDrive folder are moved
onedrive_warn_manual_check: Some files may require manual check
block_adobe_network_description: Block Adobe activation and telemetry servers with HOSTS
adobe_block_detailed_description: Blocks Adobe Creative Cloud applications from connecting to activation control and telemetry servers via HOSTS file.
adobe_block_warn_cc_sync_fail: Creative Cloud sync might not work
adobe_block_warn_online_features: Some online features might be unavailable
debloat_adobe_detailed_description: Disables unnecessary Adobe Creative Cloud services and automatic updates. Provides performance gain.
debloat_adobe_feature_disable_updates: Completely stops 3 services (AGS, AGM, Genuine Monitor)
debloat_adobe_req_installed: Adobe Creative Cloud must be installed
debloat_adobe_warn_cc_sync_fail: Creative Cloud sync might not work
debloat_adobe_warn_apps_not_work: Some Adobe applications might not work fully
disable_teredo_description: Disable IPv6 Teredo tunneling - Reduces latency in games
disable_teredo_detailed_description: Microsoft Teredo is an IPv6 transition technology. It can cause extra network latency in some games.
disable_teredo_warn_xbox_live: Some Xbox Live features might not work
disable_teredo_warn_ipv6_networks: May have issues in IPv6-only networks
windows_services_description: Manage system services and background processes
windows_update_service_description: Manage Windows Update service to control automatic updates.
windows_search_description: Index files and improve search performance.
superfetch_description: Preload frequently used applications for faster startup.
print_spooler_description: Manage print jobs and printer connections.
remove_home_gallery_step_default_locatio: Setting This PC as default location...
remove_home_gallery_default_location_mes: This PC set as default location
boost_system_performance_description: Boost your system performance with these utilities
clear_temporary_files_description: Remove temporary files and cache to free up disk space and improve performance.
clear_temp_feature_safe_deletion: Removes files that can be safely deleted
clear_temp_req_files_in_use: Some files might not be deleted if in use
clear_temp_req_open_apps_unaffected: Open applications are unaffected during the process
optimize_ssd_hdd_description: Run TRIM command on SSDs to optimize performance and extend lifespan.
optimize_ssd_hdd_detailed_description: Runs optimize-volume command for SSD and HDD disks. TRIM command runs for SSDs, defragmentation is performed for HDDs. Increases disk performance and extends SSD lifespan.
optimize_ssd_req_windows_version: Supported on Windows 8 and later systems
optimize_ssd_warn_disk_usage: Disk usage may be affected during the operation
optimize_ssd_warn_old_ssds: Very old SSD models may not support TRIM
optimize_ssd_warn_system_slowdown: System may slow down during optimization
rebuild_search_index_description: Restart Windows Search service to fix search issues and improve speed.
rebuild_search_index_detailed_descriptio: Restarts Windows Search service and rebuilds the search index. Resolves file search issues and increases search speed.
rebuild_search_feature_service_restart: Stops and starts Windows Search service
rebuild_search_req_service_installed: Windows Search service must be installed
rebuild_search_warn_search_unavailable: Search might not work during the operation
rebuild_search_warn_initial_slow: Initial searches might be slow (index rebuilding)
rebuild_search_warn_large_systems: Indexing may take long on large file systems
disk_cleanup_description: Run Windows Disk Cleanup to remove unnecessary system files.
disk_cleanup_detailed_description: Launches Windows' built-in Disk Cleanup tool. Removes unnecessary system files, update remnants, and temporary files.
disk_cleanup_req_gui_interaction: GUI opens, user must make selection
disk_cleanup_warn_system_files_confirmat: Additional confirmation needed for system file cleanup
flush_dns_cache_description: Clear DNS cache to resolve network connectivity issues.
flush_dns_cache_detailed_description: Clears and refreshes DNS cache. Resolves website access issues, deletes old DNS records, and fixes connectivity problems.
flush_dns_feature_new_queries: Ensures new DNS queries are made
flush_dns_req_dns_client_running: DNS Client service must be running
flush_dns_warn_initial_slow: Initial website access might be a bit slow
flush_dns_warn_vpn_reconnect: You may need to reconnect if using VPN
remove_home_gallery_description: Remove Home and Gallery from Explorer, set This PC as default startup location.
remove_home_gallery_detailed_description: Removes Home and Gallery sections from Windows 11's Explorer. Sets This PC as the default startup location. Provides a more traditional Explorer experience.
remove_home_gallery_feature_set_this_pc: Makes This PC the default opening page
disable_consumer_features_description: Prevent Windows from auto-installing games, apps, and Store links.
disable_consumer_feature_block_bloatware: Stops bloatware like Candy Crush, Spotify
disable_consumer_warn_store_features_aff: Some Microsoft Store features may be affected
disable_consumer_warn_updates_change_set: Windows updates might change the setting
disable_gamedvr_description: Disable Windows game recording feature. May improve gaming performance.
disable_gamedvr_detailed_description: Disables Windows Game Bar and DVR (recording) feature. Improves performance by stopping background recording services during gameplay.
disable_gamedvr_req_outside_game_session: Should be done outside game session
disable_gamedvr_warn_xbox_shortcuts_not_: Xbox Game Bar shortcuts will not work
disable_gamedvr_warn_nvidia_amd_unaffect: Nvidia/AMD's own recording features are unaffected
disable_hibernation_description: Turn off hibernation to save disk space. Mainly for desktops.
disable_hibernation_detailed_description: Disables Windows hibernation feature. Deletes hibernation file (hiberfil.sys) and gains disk space. Recommended for desktop systems.
disable_hibernation_feature_disable_fast: May also disable Fast Startup feature
disable_hibernation_req_apply_when_off: Should be applied when system is off (recommended)
disable_hibernation_req_sufficient_disk_: Sufficient disk space must be available (for the operation)
disable_hibernation_warn_battery_laptops: May be necessary for battery saving on laptops
disable_hibernation_warn_fast_startup_af: Fast Startup feature may be affected
disable_hibernation_warn_desktop_only: Suitable for desktop systems, not for laptops
add_ultimate_performance_plan_descriptio: Enable hidden Ultimate Performance power plan for maximum system performance.
add_ultimate_performance_plan_detailed_d: Activates Windows' hidden Ultimate Performance power plan. Disables all power-saving features for maximum system performance. Ideal for desktop systems and workstations.
add_ultimate_feature_disable_power_savin: All power-saving features are turned off
add_ultimate_feature_full_power: Disk, network, and CPU run at full power
add_ultimate_warn_reduced_battery_life: Battery life on laptops significantly decreases
add_ultimate_warn_increased_heat: Heating may increase, cooling is important
remove_ultimate_performance_plan_descrip: Remove the Ultimate Performance power plan if no longer needed.
remove_ultimate_performance_plan_detaile: Removes the Ultimate Performance power plan from the system. For those who want to revert to normal power plans.
remove_ultimate_req_plan_added: Ultimate Performance plan must have been added
remove_ultimate_warn_switch_plan_first: Switch to another plan first if Ultimate Performance is active
remove_ultimate_warn_can_be_readded: Plan can be re-added after removal
kill_process_confirm: Are you sure you want to kill {{name}}?
critical_process_error: ⚠️ {{name}} is a critical system process and cannot be terminated. This would cause system instability.
tweaks_page_description: Optimize your Windows experience with these recommended tweaks
set_terminal_default_ps7_description: Set Windows Terminal to use PowerShell 7 by default
set_terminal_default_ps7_detailed_descri: Sets the default shell for Windows Terminal to PowerShell 7. Provides a modern, fast, and feature-rich command-line experience.
set_terminal_default_ps7_warn_old_script: Old scripts may have compatibility issues
create_restore_point_description: Create a system restore point for safety
create_restore_point_detailed_descriptio: Creates a system restore point. Allows you to revert the system to a previous state in case of problems.
create_restore_point_feature_backs_up_re: Backs up Registry and system files
create_restore_point_feature_restore_opt: Restore option in case of problems
create_restore_point_warn_does_not_backu: Does not back up personal files
create_restore_point_warn_old_restore_po: Old restore points may be deleted
debloat_edge_description: Disable Edge telemetry and bloated features
debloat_edge_detailed_description: Disables telemetry, tracking, and unnecessary features in Microsoft Edge. Improves privacy and performance.
debloat_edge_feature_telemetry_disabled: Telemetry and data collection are turned off
debloat_edge_feature_shopping_news_disab: Features like Shopping, news feed are disabled
debloat_edge_warn_some_features_not_work: Some Edge features may not work
clear_temp_files_description_tweak: Clear temporary files to free up disk space
clear_temp_files_detailed_description_tw: Clears temporary files and frees up disk space. Improves system performance.
clear_temp_files_warn_active_apps_protec: Temp files of active applications are protected
disable_activity_history_description: Clear and disable Windows activity tracking
disable_activity_history_detailed_descri: Clears Windows activity history and disables tracking. Increases privacy and prevents data collection.
disable_activity_history_feature_no_data: Data sending to Microsoft account is blocked
disable_consumer_features_detailed_descr: Prevents Windows from automatically installing games and applications. Bloatware is prevented and disk space is preserved.
disable_consumer_features_feature_bloatw: Stops bloatware like Candy Crush, Spotify
disable_consumer_features_feature_no_ads: Start menu does not contain ads
disable_consumer_features_warn_microsoft: Some Microsoft Store suggestions will not appear
disable_consumer_features_warn_feature_u: May be re-enabled with feature updates
disable_gamedvr_description_tweak: Disable Xbox Game DVR for better performance
disable_gamedvr_detailed_description_twe: Disables Xbox Game DVR and Game Bar features. Significantly improves game performance.
disable_gamedvr_feature_cpu_gpu_reduced: CPU and GPU usage is reduced
disable_gamedvr_warn_xbox_game_bar_canno: Xbox Game Bar cannot be opened
disable_hibernation_description_tweak: Disable hibernation to gain disk space
disable_hibernation_detailed_description: Disables hibernation mode and deletes the hiberfil.sys file. Provides significant disk space.
disable_hibernation_feature_disk_space_g: Gains disk space (as much as RAM, 4-32 GB)
disable_location_tracking_detailed_descr: Completely disables Windows location tracking services. Increases privacy and prevents location data collection.
disable_location_tracking_feature_gps_wi: GPS and WiFi location tracking is blocked
disable_location_tracking_feature_app_ac: Apps' location access is turned off
disable_location_tracking_warn_maps_weat: Map and weather applications are affected
disable_location_tracking_warn_some_apps: Some applications may not work fully
disable_ps7_telemetry_detailed_descripti: Disables PowerShell 7 telemetry and usage data collection. Increases privacy.
disable_ps7_telemetry_feature_no_data_to: No data is sent to Microsoft
disable_ps7_telemetry_warn_no_contributi: No contribution to Microsoft product development
disable_storage_sense_detailed_descripti: Disables the automatic disk cleanup feature. Provides manual control and prevents unwanted file deletions.
disable_storage_sense_feature_temp_files: Temporary files are not automatically deleted
disable_storage_sense_feature_recycle_bi: Recycle Bin is not automatically emptied
disable_storage_sense_warn_manual_disk_m: Disk space must be managed manually
disable_telemetry_description_tweak: Disable Windows telemetry and data collection
disable_telemetry_detailed_description_t: Disables Windows telemetry and data collection services. Maximizes privacy.
disable_telemetry_feature_no_data_to_mic: Data transfer to Microsoft is blocked
disable_telemetry_req_windows_pro_enterp: Windows 10/11 Pro or higher is recommended
disable_telemetry_warn_home_edition_not_: Cannot be fully disabled in Home edition
disable_wifi_sense_description: Disable automatic connection to WiFi hotspots
disable_wifi_sense_detailed_description: Disables the WiFi Sense feature. Prevents automatic WiFi sharing and hotspot connections.
disable_wifi_sense_feature_auto_hotspot_: Automatic WiFi hotspot connection is blocked
disable_wifi_sense_feature_wifi_password: WiFi password sharing is turned off
disable_wifi_sense_feature_auto_connect_: Automatic connection to open networks is stopped
disable_wifi_sense_warn_hotspot_suggesti: Hotspot suggestions will not be visible
disable_wifi_sense_warn_some_auto_connec: Some automatic connection features will not work
enable_end_task_right_click_description: Add 'End Task' to the right-click context menu
enable_end_task_right_click_detailed_des: Adds an 'End Task' option to the taskbar. You can quickly close unresponsive applications.
enable_end_task_right_click_feature_add_: Adds 'End Task' to the taskbar right-click menu
enable_end_task_right_click_feature_no_t: No need to open Task Manager
prefer_ipv4_over_ipv6_detailed_descripti: Prioritizes the IPv4 protocol but does not disable IPv6. May improve network performance in some cases.
prefer_ipv4_over_ipv6_feature_ipv6_secon: IPv6 remains active but has secondary priority
prefer_ipv4_over_ipv6_feature_ipv4_dns_p: IPv4 is preferred in DNS queries
prefer_ipv4_over_ipv6_warn_modern_ipv6_o: May cause issues on modern IPv6-only networks
prefer_ipv4_over_ipv6_warn_no_guarantee_: Performance increase is not always guaranteed
run_disk_cleanup_description: Clean system files and free up space
run_disk_cleanup_detailed_description: Runs the Windows Disk Cleanup tool. Cleans system files and unnecessary data.
run_disk_cleanup_feature_significant_dis: Frees up significant disk space (1-10 GB)
run_disk_cleanup_req_duration: The process may take a few minutes
run_disk_cleanup_warn_windows_update_rol: Windows Update rollback option may be lost
run_disk_cleanup_warn_safe_recommended: It is a safe and recommended operation
set_hibernation_default_detailed_descrip: Enables hibernation mode. Provides battery savings for laptop users.
set_hibernation_default_feature_ram_to_d: RAM content is saved to disk
set_hibernation_default_req_disk_space: Disk space is required (as much as RAM)
settings_discord_token_description: Save your user token once and reuse it across modules.
settings_discord_token_rate_limit_hint: Frequent checks may hit Discord rate limits.
settings_discord_token_export_warning: Export includes tokens in plain text. Keep the file safe.
discord_token_missing: No saved token found. Add one in settings to use this module.
settings_launch_on_startup_description: Automatically start ConfUtils when Windows starts
settings_enable_notifications_descriptio: Show desktop notifications for important events
settings_minimize_to_tray_description: Keep ConfUtils running in system tray when minimized
settings_language_description: Select your preferred language for the application
settings_font_size_description: Adjust the overall UI text size.
settings_check_for_updates_description: Check if a newer version of ConfUtils is available
settings_reset_settings_description: Restore all settings to their default values
notification_up_to_date_message: You are using the latest version (v0.3.0)
notification_reset_settings_message: All settings have been reset to defaults
settings_auto_cleanup_description: Automatically run cleanup when the computer starts.
settings_auto_cleanup_detailed_descripti: Automatically cleans temporary files when Windows starts and frees up disk space. Improves system performance and regularly removes unnecessary files.
settings_auto_cleanup_warning_1: Some temporary files may be in use
settings_auto_cleanup_warning_2: Process may delay system startup by a few seconds
settings_auto_cleanup_tech_details: Cleanup process: %TEMP%, C:\Windows\Temp, Prefetch, Browser Cache | Browser caches and Windows temporary files are deleted
advanced_tweaks_page_warning: CAUTION: These tweaks may affect system stability. Use at your own risk!
advanced_tweaks_disable_background_apps_: Stop apps from running in background
Prevents Windows applications from running in the background. This conserves system resources and enhances privacy.
Modifies group policy settings for background apps
Stops background data submission for privacy
Some apps may not receive notifications
Apps like Mail, Calendar may not send notifications
Some apps may lose their full functionality
The setting can always be reverted
advanced_tweaks_disable_fullscreen_optim: Disables Windows fullscreen optimizations. Improves performance and FPS in games and fullscreen applications.
Turns off fullscreen optimization for all applications
This is already the default setting for some games
Has a positive effect on most modern games
advanced_tweaks_disable_intel_mm_detaile: Disables Intel Management Engine (ME) and vPro LMS services. Frees up system resources and reduces potential security risks.
advanced_tweaks_disable_intel_mm_warning: Corporate management features may not work
advanced_tweaks_disable_intel_mm_tech_de: Services: LMS, Intel(R) Management Engine | Startup Type: Disabled
advanced_tweaks_disable_ipv6_detailed_de: Completely disables the IPv6 protocol on the system. Only IPv4 is used. May improve network performance in some cases.
advanced_tweaks_disable_ipv6_feature_1: Turns off IPv6 on all network adapters
advanced_tweaks_disable_ipv6_warning_1: IPv6 may be required on modern networks
advanced_tweaks_disable_ipv6_warning_3: Features like DirectAccess will not work
advanced_tweaks_disable_copilot_detailed: Removes the Microsoft Copilot feature and taskbar button in Windows 11. Disables AI assistant features.
advanced_tweaks_disable_copilot_feature_: Removes the Copilot button from the taskbar
advanced_tweaks_disable_copilot_warning_: May come back with Windows updates
advanced_tweaks_disable_notification_tra: Disables the Windows notification center and action center. Reduces system resource usage and prevents distracting notifications.
Important system notifications may not be visible
Windows Update notifications will not appear
advanced_tweaks_change_dns_description: Select a DNS provider and click Execute to apply
advanced_tweaks_change_dns_detailed_desc: Changes system DNS settings to popular and fast DNS providers. Improves internet speed and security.
advanced_tweaks_change_dns_warning_1: Some regional sites may be affected
advanced_tweaks_change_dns_warning_2: ISP DNS may be faster for local content
advanced_tweaks_change_dns_tech_details: Network Adapter Settings: IPv4 DNS Primary & Secondary | Cloudflare: 1.1.1.1, 1.0.0.1 | Google: 8.8.8.8, 8.8.4.4 | Quad9: 9.9.9.9, 149.112.112.112
advanced_tweaks_remove_all_store_apps_wa: This will remove ALL Microsoft Store apps except critical ones. Continue?
advanced_tweaks_remove_all_store_apps_de: Removes most Microsoft Store apps. Critical system apps are preserved. Frees up significant disk space.
advanced_tweaks_remove_all_store_apps_fe: Removes pre-installed games like Candy Crush, Netflix
Critical apps are preserved (Settings, Store, Photos)
advanced_tweaks_remove_all_store_apps_re: The operation is irreversible (can be reinstalled from the Store)
advanced_tweaks_remove_all_store_apps_wa: DANGEROUS: Apps you use may be deleted!
Some apps may be necessary for the system
You can reinstall after the operation is complete
advanced_tweaks_remove_all_store_apps_te: PowerShell: Get-AppxPackage (excludes critical packages) | Remove-AppxPackage | Keeps: Microsoft.WindowsStore, Microsoft.Windows.Photos, Microsoft.WindowsCalculator
advanced_tweaks_remove_edge_warning_prom: This will completely remove Microsoft Edge from your system. Continue?
advanced_tweaks_remove_edge_detailed_des: Completely removes the Microsoft Edge browser from the system. Frees up disk space but may affect some Windows features.
advanced_tweaks_remove_edge_warning_1: VERY DANGEROUS: Some Windows features are affected!
advanced_tweaks_remove_edge_warning_2: The Windows Update panel uses Edge
advanced_tweaks_remove_edge_warning_4: Some system components use the Edge engine
advanced_tweaks_remove_onedrive_warning_: This will uninstall OneDrive and move files to default locations. Continue?
advanced_tweaks_remove_onedrive_detailed: Uninstalls the OneDrive application and moves files to local locations. Completely disables cloud synchronization.
advanced_tweaks_remove_onedrive_feature_: OneDrive files are moved to a local folder
OneDrive is removed from File Explorer
advanced_tweaks_remove_onedrive_requirem: OneDrive files should be backed up
advanced_tweaks_remove_onedrive_warning_: Your cloud files will not be synchronized
Files are moved to the local disk (space required)
May come back with operating system updates
advanced_tweaks_remove_onedrive_tech_det: Uninstall: %SystemRoot%\SysWOW64\OneDriveSetup.exe /uninstall | Registry: Remove OneDrive from Shell namespace
advanced_tweaks_set_classic_right_click_: Restores the classic Windows 10 right-click menu in Windows 11. Requires fewer clicks and provides faster access.
Brings back the Windows 10 style context menu
No need to click 'Show more options'
All classic options are directly visible
More efficient than the modern menu
May be reverted by Windows updates
advanced_tweaks_set_display_for_performa: Disable visual effects for better performance
Switches the system to performance mode by disabling visual effects. Reduces CPU and GPU usage.
Shadows and soft edges are removed
SystemPropertiesPerformance: VisualEffects = Adjust for best performance | Registry: HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\VisualEffects
advanced_tweaks_set_time_utc_description: Good for dual boot with Linux
advanced_tweaks_set_time_utc_detailed_de: Sets the Windows hardware clock to UTC (Coordinated Universal Time). Fixes time synchronization issues with Linux in dual boot systems.
advanced_tweaks_set_time_utc_feature_1: Switches RTC (Real-Time Clock) to UTC mode
advanced_tweaks_set_time_utc_feature_4: Daylight saving time changes are not affected
advanced_tweaks_set_time_utc_requirement: Recommended for dual boot with Linux
advanced_tweaks_set_time_utc_warning_1: Not necessary if you only use Windows
advanced_tweaks_set_time_utc_warning_2: Some older programs may be affected
advanced_tweaks_set_time_utc_warning_3: BIOS clock is displayed as UTC
advanced_tweaks_block_adobe_network_deta: Blocks Adobe activation and license servers via the hosts file. Prevents license verification.
advanced_tweaks_block_adobe_network_feat: Adds entries to the hosts file
advanced_tweaks_block_adobe_network_tech: File: C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts | Blocks: activate.adobe.com, lmlicenses.wip4.adobe.com, lm.licenses.adobe.com
advanced_tweaks_debloat_adobe_detailed_d: Disables unnecessary services and telemetry features of Adobe applications. Conserves system resources and enhances privacy.
advanced_tweaks_debloat_adobe_warning_1: Adobe updates must be done manually
advanced_tweaks_debloat_adobe_warning_2: Creative Cloud features may be limited
advanced_tweaks_debloat_adobe_warning_3: Some synchronization features will not work
advanced_tweaks_debloat_adobe_tech_detai: Services: AdobeUpdateService, AGSService, CCXProcess, CoreSync | Startup type: Disabled | Registry: Disable telemetry endpoints
advanced_tweaks_remove_home_gallery_desc: Remove from Explorer, set This PC default
advanced_tweaks_remove_home_gallery_deta: Removes the Home and Gallery sections from Windows 11 File Explorer. Sets This PC as the default startup page.
advanced_tweaks_remove_home_gallery_feat: File Explorer starts with This PC
advanced_tweaks_remove_home_gallery_warn: Quick access is not changed, only the startup
advanced_tweaks_disable_teredo_detailed_: Disables the Teredo IPv6 tunneling protocol. Reduces network latency and improves security.
advanced_tweaks_disable_teredo_requireme: Safe if you are not using IPv6 behind a NAT
advanced_tweaks_disable_teredo_warning_1: IPv6 NAT traversal will not work
advanced_tweaks_disable_teredo_warning_2: Some P2P applications may be affected
advanced_tweaks_disable_teredo_warning_3: Users of DirectAccess should be careful
advanced_tweaks_disable_teredo_tech_deta: Command: netsh interface teredo set state disabled | Service: iphlpsvc (IP Helper) continues running
optimization_page_description: Boost your system performance with these utilities
optimization_clear_temp_description: Remove temporary files and cache to free up disk space and improve performance.
optimization_clear_temp_detailed_descrip: Cleans temporary files, cache files, and prefetch data accumulated in the Windows system. Frees up disk space and improves system performance.
optimization_clear_temp_feature_4: Removes files that can be safely deleted
optimization_clear_temp_requirement_2: Some files may not be deleted if they are in use
optimization_clear_temp_requirement_3: Open applications are not affected during the process
optimization_clear_temp_warning_3: The operation is irreversible but harmless
optimization_clear_temp_tech_details: Temp Paths: %TEMP%, C:\Windows\Temp, C:\Windows\Prefetch | Safe deletion with error handling | Skips locked files
optimization_optimize_ssd_description: Run TRIM command on SSDs to optimize performance and extend lifespan.
optimization_optimize_ssd_detailed_descr: Runs the optimize-volume command for SSD and HDD disks. The TRIM command runs for SSDs, and defragmentation is performed for HDDs. Increases disk performance and extends SSD lifespan.
optimization_optimize_ssd_requirement_2: Supported on Windows 8 and later systems
optimization_optimize_ssd_warning_1: Disk usage may be affected during the operation
optimization_optimize_ssd_warning_2: Very old SSD models may not support TRIM
optimization_optimize_ssd_warning_3: The system may slow down during optimization
optimization_optimize_ssd_tech_details: Command: Optimize-Volume -DriveLetter C -ReTrim -Verbose | TRIM for SSDs, Defrag for HDDs | NTFS file system optimization
optimization_rebuild_search_index_descri: Restart Windows Search service to fix search issues and improve speed.
optimization_rebuild_search_index_detail: Restarts the Windows Search service and rebuilds the search index. Resolves file search issues and increases search speed.
optimization_rebuild_search_index_featur: Stops and starts the Windows Search service
optimization_rebuild_search_index_requir: Windows Search service must be installed
optimization_rebuild_search_index_warnin: Search may not work during the operation
Initial searches may be slow (index rebuilding)
Indexing may take a long time on large file systems
optimization_rebuild_search_index_tech_d: Service: Windows Search (WSearch) | Index Path: C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Search | Stop-Service → Start-Service
optimization_disk_cleanup_description: Run Windows Disk Cleanup to remove unnecessary system files.
optimization_disk_cleanup_detailed_descr: Launches the built-in Windows Disk Cleanup tool. Removes unnecessary system files, update remnants, and temporary files.
optimization_disk_cleanup_requirement_1: Administrator privileges are recommended (for all options)
optimization_disk_cleanup_requirement_2: A GUI opens, the user must make selections
optimization_disk_cleanup_warning_2: Additional confirmation is needed for system file cleanup
optimization_disk_cleanup_tech_details: Tool: cleanmgr.exe | GUI-based cleanup wizard | Removes: update cache, temp files, thumbnails, recycle bin
optimization_flush_dns_description: Clear DNS cache to resolve network connectivity issues.
optimization_flush_dns_detailed_descript: Clears and refreshes the DNS cache. Resolves website access issues, deletes old DNS records, and fixes connectivity problems.
optimization_flush_dns_feature_3: Ensures new DNS queries are made
optimization_flush_dns_requirement_3: DNS Client service must be running
optimization_flush_dns_warning_1: Initial website access might be a bit slow
optimization_flush_dns_warning_2: You may need to reconnect if using a VPN
optimization_flush_dns_tech_details: Command: ipconfig /flushdns | Clears DNS Resolver Cache | Service: DNS Client (Dnscache)
optimization_remove_home_gallery_descrip: Remove Home and Gallery from Explorer, set This PC as default startup location.
optimization_remove_home_gallery_detaile: Removes the Home and Gallery sections from Windows 11's Explorer. Sets This PC as the default startup location. Provides a more traditional Explorer experience.
optimization_remove_home_gallery_feature: Removes the Home tab from Explorer
Makes This PC the default opening page
optimization_disable_consumer_features_d: Prevent Windows from auto-installing games, apps, and Store links.
Prevents Windows from automatically installing games, apps, and Microsoft Store links. Stops the automatic installation of recommended applications like Candy Crush, Xbox Game Pass.
optimization_disable_consumer_features_f: Stops bloatware like Candy Crush, Spotify
optimization_disable_consumer_features_w: Some Microsoft Store features may be affected
Windows updates might change the setting
optimization_disable_gamedvr_description: Disable Windows game recording feature. May improve gaming performance.
optimization_disable_gamedvr_detailed_de: Disables the Windows Game Bar and DVR (recording) feature. Improves performance by stopping background recording services during gameplay.
optimization_disable_gamedvr_requirement: Should be done outside a game session
optimization_disable_gamedvr_warning_2: Xbox Game Bar shortcuts will not work
optimization_disable_gamedvr_warning_3: The screenshot feature may be affected
optimization_disable_gamedvr_warning_4: Nvidia/AMD's own recording features are unaffected
optimization_disable_hibernation_descrip: Turn off hibernation to save disk space. Mainly for desktops.
optimization_disable_hibernation_detaile: Disables the Windows hibernation feature. Deletes the hibernation file (hiberfil.sys) and gains disk space. Recommended for desktop systems.
optimization_disable_hibernation_feature: Completely turns off the hibernation feature
Deletes the hiberfil.sys file (size of RAM)
May also disable the Fast Startup feature
optimization_disable_hibernation_require: Should be applied when the system is off (recommended)
Sufficient disk space must be available (for the operation)
optimization_disable_hibernation_warning: The Hibernate (Sleep Mode) option is removed
May be necessary for battery saving on laptops
The Fast Startup feature may be affected
Suitable for desktop systems, not for laptops
optimization_disable_hibernation_tech_de: Command: powercfg /hibernate off | Deletes: C:\hiberfil.sys | Size saved: RAM size (4-32GB typical)
optimization_add_ultimate_power_plan_des: Enable hidden Ultimate Performance power plan for maximum system performance.
optimization_add_ultimate_power_plan_det: Activates the hidden Ultimate Performance power plan in Windows. Disables all power-saving features for maximum system performance. Ideal for desktop systems and workstations.
optimization_add_ultimate_power_plan_fea: Activates the hidden Ultimate Performance plan
All power-saving features are turned off
Disk, network, and CPU run at full power
optimization_add_ultimate_power_plan_war: Battery life on laptops decreases significantly
Heating may increase, cooling is important
optimization_remove_ultimate_power_plan_: Remove the Ultimate Performance power plan if no longer needed.
Removes the Ultimate Performance power plan from the system. For those who want to revert to normal power plans.
Cleans from the power management list
The system reverts to default plans
The Ultimate Performance plan must have been added
If the Ultimate Performance plan is active, switch to another plan first
The plan can be re-added after removal
optimization_set_services_manual_descrip: Set resource-heavy services to manual startup to improve boot time and reduce background resource usage
optimization_set_services_manual_detaile: Changes the startup type of non-essential Windows services from automatic to manual. This prevents these services from starting automatically with Windows, reducing boot time and freeing up system resources. Services will still start when needed by applications.
optimization_set_services_manual_require: Some services may be needed by specific hardware or software
optimization_set_services_manual_warning: Some features may require manual service startup
Bluetooth, Smart Card, and similar hardware services will not start automatically
Changes can be reverted by setting services back to automatic in Services Manager
optimization_set_services_manual_tech_de: Sets 35+ non-essential services to manual startup using PowerShell Set-Service cmdlet. Includes services like Bluetooth, Geolocation, Phone Service, Sensor services, etc.
optimization_set_services_manual_success: Services successfully set to manual startup
process_modal_remove_home_gallery_step_2: Setting This PC as default location...
This PC set as default location
fixes_page_description: Fix common Windows issues and reset system components
fixes_remove_adobe_cc_description: Completely remove Adobe Creative Cloud using official cleaner tool.
fixes_remove_adobe_cc_detailed_descripti: Completely removes Adobe Creative Cloud and all related components from the system. Uses Adobe's official Cleaner Tool.
fixes_remove_adobe_cc_feature_1: Uninstalls the Adobe Creative Cloud Desktop application
fixes_remove_adobe_cc_feature_2: Cleans up Adobe services and background processes
fixes_remove_adobe_cc_warning_1: All Adobe applications will be removed
fixes_remove_adobe_cc_warning_3: A new installation is required to reinstall
fixes_remove_adobe_cc_warning_4: Creative Cloud files may be deleted
fixes_remove_adobe_cc_tech_details: Tool: Adobe Creative Cloud Cleaner Tool | Removes: CC Desktop, services, registry entries | Official Adobe utility
fixes_reset_network_description: Reset all network adapters and TCP/IP stack to fix connectivity issues.
fixes_reset_network_detailed_description: Resets network adapters, the TCP/IP stack, and the Winsock catalog to default settings. Resolves internet connectivity issues.
fixes_reset_network_feature_2: Returns the TCP/IP stack to default
fixes_reset_network_requirement_2: System must be restarted after the process
fixes_reset_network_requirement_3: Network connection will be temporarily lost
fixes_reset_network_warning_1: Static IP settings will be reset
fixes_reset_network_warning_3: Wi-Fi passwords may be lost (must be re-entered)
fixes_reset_network_tech_details: Commands: netsh winsock reset | netsh int ip reset | ipconfig /release | ipconfig /renew | ipconfig /flushdns
fixes_reset_windows_update_description: Reset Windows Update components to fix update errors and download issues.
fixes_reset_windows_update_detailed_desc: Resets Windows Update components, restarts update services, and clears corrupted updates. Fixes update errors.
fixes_reset_windows_update_feature_1: Stops and starts Windows Update services
fixes_reset_windows_update_requirement_2: There should be no ongoing updates
fixes_reset_windows_update_warning_1: Downloaded updates will be deleted (will be re-downloaded)
fixes_reset_windows_update_warning_4: Check for updates again after the process
fixes_reset_windows_update_tech_details: Services: wuauserv, bits, cryptsvc | Folders: SoftwareDistribution, Catroot2 | Commands: net stop/start
fixes_system_corruption_scan_description: Run DISM and SFC to detect and repair corrupted system files.
fixes_system_corruption_scan_detailed_de: Runs DISM (Deployment Image Servicing and Management) and SFC (System File Checker) tools. Detects and repairs corrupted system files.
fixes_system_corruption_scan_feature_1: Checks the Windows image with DISM
fixes_system_corruption_scan_warning_1: May take a long time, be patient
fixes_system_corruption_scan_warning_2: Do not turn off the computer during the process
fixes_system_corruption_scan_warning_3: Some system files may be changed
fixes_system_corruption_scan_warning_4: Take a backup on critical systems
fixes_reinstall_winget_description: Completely reinstall Windows Package Manager (winget) to fix package errors.
fixes_reinstall_winget_detailed_descript: Completely uninstalls the Windows Package Manager (winget) application and reinstalls the latest version. Fixes WinGet issues.
fixes_reinstall_winget_warning_1: Current WinGet settings will be reset
fixes_reinstall_winget_warning_2: Package sources will return to default
fixes_reinstall_winget_warning_3: The download process may take time
fixes_reinstall_winget_warning_4: The Store application must be running
fixes_reinstall_winget_tech_details: Package: Microsoft.DesktopAppInstaller | Source: Microsoft Store / GitHub | Latest version from official repository
process_modal_remove_adobe_cc_step_1: Downloading Adobe Creative Cloud Cleaner Tool...
process_modal_reset_network_success: Network settings have been reset. It is recommended to restart your system.
discord_page_description: Discord server management and automation tools
discord_server_cloner_description: Clone a Discord server with all channels, roles, and settings
confirm_disable_recall_message: This will completely disable the Windows Recall feature. Do you want to continue?
confirm_remove_onedrive_message: This will completely remove OneDrive from your system. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
confirm_disable_telemetry_advanced_messa: This will disable all Windows telemetry services and scheduled tasks. Some Windows features may not work properly. Do you want to continue?
confirm_disable_location_advanced_messag: This will completely disable all location services and sensors. Maps and location-based apps will not work. Do you want to continue?
confirm_clear_history_message: This will delete all your Windows activity history, recent files, and Cortana cache. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
confirm_block_adobe_message: This will block Adobe activation and update servers. Adobe Creative Cloud sync and online features will not work. Do you want to continue?
confirm_debloat_adobe_message: This will disable Adobe Creative Cloud background services and automatic updates. Some Adobe features may not work properly. Do you want to continue?
confirm_disable_teredo_message: This will disable the Teredo IPv6 transition protocol. Xbox Live and some IPv6 networks may not work. Do you want to continue?
confirm_debloat_edge_message: This will remove unnecessary features and components from Microsoft Edge. Some features may not work unless Edge is reinstalled. Do you want to continue?
confirm_disable_activity_history_tweaks_: This will completely clear and disable your Windows activity history. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
confirm_disable_consumer_features_messag: This will disable Windows consumer features. It will block Windows Store suggestions and automatic app installations. Do you want to continue?
confirm_run_disk_cleanup_message: This will delete temporary files, system cache, and other unnecessary files. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
confirm_remove_adobe_cc_message: This will completely remove Adobe Creative Cloud and all related components. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
confirm_reset_network_message: This will reset all network settings to factory defaults. WiFi passwords and connection settings will be deleted. You will need to restart your computer. Do you want to continue?
confirm_clear_temp_message: This will delete all temporary files and caches. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
confirm_set_services_manual_message: This will set some Windows services to manual startup. This may prevent some features from working automatically. Do you want to continue?
please_do_not_close: Please do not close the application
discord_message_cloner_description: Copy messages from a channel to a webhook. Historic messages or live message stream.
discord_delay_hint: Delay between each message to avoid rate limits (500-5000ms)
discord_live_mode_active: Live Mode Active - New messages are being copied automatically
discord_reaction_spammer_description: Automatically add bulk reactions to a message
discord_nickname_changer_description: Change your nickname in the server
discord_bulk_delete_description: Delete your own messages in bulk
discord_dm_bomber_description: Send bulk DM messages to users
discord_channel_purge_description: Bulk delete all messages in a channel (requires permissions)
discord_purge_warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone! Only messages newer than 14 days will be deleted
discord_role_cloner_description: Clone a role with all its properties
discord_token_checker_description: Check if your Discord token is valid
discord_token_info_description: View detailed information about your token
discord_webhook_delete_warning: ⚠️ This action cannot be undone! The webhook will be permanently deleted
discord_member_scraper_description: Extract and export server member list with details
discord_member_scraper_info_1: Exports all server members to a file
discord_member_scraper_info_2: Includes usernames, IDs, roles, and join dates
discord_member_scraper_info_3: Large servers may take several minutes
discord_server_backup_description: Backup server configuration or restore from backup file
discord_backup_warning_1: Backups save server structure, not messages or members
discord_backup_warning_2: Restore will overwrite target server settings
discord_backup_warning_3: Keep backup files safe - they contain sensitive data
discord_hypesquad_info_1: Change your Hypesquad House badge instantly
discord_hypesquad_cooldown_warning: There may be a cooldown period between changes
discord_token_warning: Don't share your token with 3rd parties!
discord_emojis_required: Please enter at least one emoji
update_install_question: Would you like to download and install the update now?
update_installed_message: Update installed successfully. The application will restart...
no_updates_message: You're already using the latest version (v{{version}})
update_check_failed_message: Automatic update check failed. Opening releases page in browser...
dashboard_generate_system_report_descrip: Creates a detailed system analysis report using Windows perfmon
dashboard_generating_system_report_messa: Generating system report, this will take approximately 60 seconds. Please wait...
login_server_requirement: You must be a member of our Discord server to use this application
login_token_guide_title: How to Get Your Discord Token
login_guide_step1_desc: Go to discord.com and login to your account
login_guide_step3_desc: Click on the "Application" tab in Developer Tools
login_guide_step5_desc1: Use the filter box and type "token"
login_guide_warning_desc: Never share your token with anyone! It gives full access to your Discord account.
login_error_not_member: You are not a member of the required Discord server! Please join our server at https://discord.gg/hbht3K4zJg to use this application.
login_error_invalid_token: Invalid token or authentication failed. Please check your token.
login_error_network: Connection error. Please check your internet connection.
wifi_passwords_description: View saved WiFi networks and passwords on this computer.
file_shredder_description: Permanently delete files so they cannot be recovered.
shred_warning_text: Files deleted with this tool cannot be recovered even by data recovery software. Use with caution.
shred_select_file: Click to select a file to shred
shred_success: File securely shredded and deleted permanently.
shred_info_description: Secure File Shredder uses advanced overwriting algorithms to permanently delete files, making data recovery impossible even with professional recovery tools.
shred_info_how_it_works_text: The file shredder overwrites the file data multiple times with random patterns before deletion. This process ensures that the original data cannot be recovered by any means.
shred_info_feature_1: Multiple overwrite passes for maximum security
shred_info_feature_3: Permanent deletion beyond normal file deletion
shred_info_feature_4: Works with all file types and sizes
shred_info_effectiveness_text: Yes, Secure File Shredder is highly effective. It uses industry-standard secure deletion methods that exceed the requirements of most data protection regulations. Once a file is shredded, it cannot be recovered by data recovery software, forensic tools, or any other means.
shred_info_technical_text: The shredding process uses a multi-pass overwrite algorithm. Each pass writes random data patterns over the original file content. This method ensures that even advanced recovery techniques cannot reconstruct the original data. The process is designed to meet and exceed standards for secure data deletion.
shred_info_warning_1: This action is PERMANENT and IRREVERSIBLE
shred_info_warning_2: No data recovery software can restore shredded files
shred_info_warning_3: Make sure you have backups of important files before shredding
shred_info_warning_4: System files and critical application files should never be shredded
shred_info_warning_5: Shredding may take longer for large files
shred_info_use_case_3: Cleaning up files before selling or disposing of your computer
shred_info_use_case_4: Permanently removing files that contain sensitive information
discord_custom_rpc_description: Customize your Discord 'Playing' status with rich details and images.
discord_rpc_large_image_key: Large Image Key (URL or Asset Name)
discord_rpc_description_text: Customize your Discord "Playing" status with rich details, images, and buttons.
crosshair_description: Add a customizable crosshair overlay for games.
backup_recovery_description: Manage system restore points and backups
system_monitor_description: Real-time system monitoring and process management
network_manager_description: Manage network adapters, firewall, DNS, and connections
disconnect_confirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect this connection?
about_description: System optimization and management tool for Windows
about_info_description: ConfUtils is a comprehensive Windows system optimization and management tool. It provides powerful features for system monitoring, privacy protection, optimization, and more.
about_credits_description: Built with modern technologies and best practices.
about_help_description: Need help? Join our Discord server for support, updates, and community discussions.
kill_process_confirm: Are you sure you want to kill this process?
name: Name
create_restore_point_description: Create a new system restore point
create_first_restore_point: Create your first restore point to get started
confirm_restore_message: This will restore your system to the restore point created on {{date}}. This action cannot be undone. Continue?
confirm_delete_restore_point_message: This will permanently delete this restore point. Continue?
backup_warning_1: System restore points are automatically created by Windows
backup_warning_2: Restoring will revert system settings and installed programs
backup_warning_3: Your personal files will not be affected
backup_warning_4: The system will restart during restore
browser_cleaner_description: Clear browser history, cookies, and cache
